row.process:
! &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string
:SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'USER','1') :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'PASSWORD','1') :SET &MY_IVANTI_SERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'IVANTI_SERVER','1') :SET &MY_SOAP_LINK#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_LINK','1') :SET &PACKAGE#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'CHECK_MK','1') :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $i=1
$my_host="&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" write-host "$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString &MY_PASSWORD# -AsPlainText -Force" write-host "$mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential (&MY_USER#, $secpasswd)" write-host "$myWS = New-WebServiceProxy -uri http://&MY_IVANTI_SERVER#/MBSDKService/MsgSDK.asmx?WSDL -Credential $mycreds" write-host "$myWS.Install ... ?" $RC=$? if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" break } else { Start-Sleep -s $tempo $i++ } } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: IVANTI CHECK_MK &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,IVANTI CHECK_MK &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="IVANTI CHECK_MK &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: IVANTI CHECK_MK &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,IVANTI CHECK_MK &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
